Interface GTNetMessageJpaRepository

  • Method Details

    • markAsRead

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE GTNetMessage m SET m.hasBeenRead = true WHERE m.idGtNetMessage = ?1") int markAsRead(Integer idGtNetMessage)
      Marks a message as read by setting hasBeenRead to true.
      Parameters:
      idGtNetMessage - the ID of the message to mark as read
      Returns:
      number of rows updated (0 or 1)

    • findAllByOrderByIdGtNetAscTimestampDesc

      List<GTNetMessage> findAllByOrderByIdGtNetAscTimestampDesc()

    • findUnansweredRequests

      @Query(name="GTNetMessage.findUnansweredRequests", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findUnansweredRequests(byte sendRecv, List<Byte> messageCodes)
      Finds unanswered request messages based on direction and message codes. Named query: GTNetMessage.findUnansweredRequests Returns Object[] with: [0] = id_gt_net (Integer), [1] = id_gt_net_message (Integer)
      Parameters:
      sendRecv - the direction of request messages (0=SEND for outgoing, 1=RECEIVED for incoming)
      messageCodes - list of message codes that require a response (_RR_ codes: 1, 10, 50)
      Returns:
      list of Object[] containing [id_gt_net, id_gt_net_message] for unanswered requests
